title: Muddling Through
resume: Muddling Through is an American sitcom that aired on CBS from July 9, 1994 to September 7, 1994. The series centered on Connie Drego who, after spending two years in jail for shooting her cheating husband, returns home to the motel she owns and to her two daughters.
